GameItemType.Description:
More of a table-sized slab of iron than a blade, this gigantic, heavy, and incredibly powerful sword can only be used by those marked by eeriness. This heap of raw iron can also be used as a shield against projectiles and is particularly effective against Demons and Undead, as it exists simultaneously in the astral and physical worlds.
The sword is not without drawbacks: every time the sword is used in combat, its user will suffer a random negative permanent effect.

::: Marksman Bow ::: ::: +3 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Marksman
